Package bcid

The BCID package contains the core components of the BCID system, including minting, creation, and working with BCIDS

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
encoder Encoders interface defines the methods and fields that the various encoders need to implement
 

Class Summary
bcid The bcid class encapsulates all of the information we know about a particular identifier, including the status of EZID creation, associated dataset calls, and any metadata.
bcidEncoder bcid identifiers operate by equating encoded Strings directly to BigIntegers in the database.
bcidMinter the bcidMinter class is the mechanism by which bcids interact with the mysql backend database.
CheckDigit The Check Digit algorithm is adapted from http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Luhn_mod_N_algorithm
database Creates the connection for the backend bcid database.
dataset This class mints shoulders for use in the BCID and EZID systems, defining datasets.
datasetEncoder The purpsose of the datasetEncoder is to encode very short identifiers for EZID shoulders to represent unique datasets.
inputFileParser Parse an input File and construct a bcid Iterator which can be fetched
manageEZID Class to work with EZID creation from the bcid database.
resolver Resolves any incoming identifier to the BCID and/or EZID systems.
ResourceType Components used to describe individual resource types.
ResourceTypes ResourceTypes class is a controlled list of available ResourceTypes.
run This is a class used for running/testing Identifier creation methods.
 

Package bcid Description

The BCID package contains the core components of the BCID system, including minting, creation, and working with BCIDS
